definition: variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
lookup table for Chinese character based on radical and stroke count

sentences.english: This algorithm can extract handwritten Chinese characters stroke for formal Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 該算法可對書寫工整的漢字進行有效筆劃提取。

sentences.english: The compressed symbol allowed the transcriber to complete the letter in a single stroke.
sentences.chinese: 這個壓扁的符號讓謄寫者用單筆劃結束書信。

sentences.english: Thread-bound book was scribinged with red rough pencil line.
sentences.chinese: 線裝書竟用紅鉛筆劃粗粗的線。

sentences.english: Thread-bound books are painted with rough line by red pencil.
sentences.chinese: 線裝書竟用紅鉛筆劃粗粗的線。

sentences.english: It is the distance between the base line and the ascender line or cap line.
sentences.chinese: 是從基線到大寫頂線或上升筆劃線的距離。

sentences.english: Many designs choose that the ascender line to be their cap line as well.
sentences.chinese: 很多字體設計用上升筆劃作爲大寫字母的頂線。

sentences.english: Alternating the basic stroke set can change the type of font generated.
sentences.chinese: 改變基本筆劃庫，可改變生成的字體種類。

sentences.english: Otherwise, I use a red pencil to draw heavy underlines.
sentences.chinese: 線裝書竟用紅鉛筆劃粗粗的線。

sentences.english: GetBounds This returns a rectangle (in a Rect structure) that represents the bounding box of the strokes.
sentences.chinese: 該方法返回一個矩形，該矩形爲包含所有筆劃的邊框。

sentences.english: Those thread-bound books were all marked with red thick line.
sentences.chinese: 線裝書竟用紅鉛筆劃粗粗的線。

definition: style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
the tip of a writing brush/vigor of style in writing/stroke/touch
